virtualization.deleteViewModalMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the "{{name}}" view?
virtualization.emptyStateInfoMessage: There are no virtualizations available. Please click on the button below to import one.

virtualization.viewEmptyStateInfo: There are no views available. Please click on the button below to create one.
